abstract: Apple put to rest the last of a series of lawsuits it brought in a losing and costly effort to put a stop to Web leaks about its product plans.
snippet: Apple put to rest the last of a series of lawsuits it brought in a losing and costly effort to put a stop to Web leaks about its product plans.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Apple on Thursday put to rest the last of a series of lawsuits it brought in a losing and costly effort to put a stop to Web leaks about its product plans.

headline.main: Apple Rumor Site to Shut Down in Settlement
headline.print_headline: Apple Deal To End Suits Over Leaks To Web Sites
